name: mirror-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to lower the target’s accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user lets loose a flash of energy at the target from its polished body. This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
